body: what happened to the other 2 girls he permanently hypnotized. also why is he still using his phone instead of the light he got. i mean if your going to end 8 with him acquiring the ability to make permanent slaves then fucking use it. i would understand if he used the phone to get her to go to his house but not just continue the same thing.
